statements: SELECT * FROM financial_audit_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT log_id, user_id, action FROM financial_audit_log WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT table_name, timestamp FROM financial_audit_log WHERE action = 'INSERT' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM financial_audit_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59'
SELECT DISTINCT action FROM financial_audit_log
SELECT * FROM financial_audit_log WHERE user_id = '5a08894f-d08a-4472-9943-75912d0c8557' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_id, action, table_name FROM financial_audit_log WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND action IN ('INSERT', 'UPDATE') ORDER BY log_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM financial_audit_log WHERE table_name = 'users' ORDER BY timestamp DESC, action ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT DISTINCT table_name FROM financial_audit_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT log_id, user_id, action, table_name, timestamp FROM financial_audit_log WHERE action IS NOT NULL AND table_name NOT IN ('employees', 'departments') ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 15;
SELECT * FROM financial_changes
SELECT change_description, change_date, user_id FROM financial_changes WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC
SELECT user_id, log_date, action_taken FROM audit_logs WHERE action_taken = 'create' OR action_taken = 'update'
SELECT user_id, log_date, action_taken FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM financial_changes WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, change_description FROM financial_changes WHERE change_date > '2022-01-01' LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_changes, MAX(change_date) AS latest_change FROM financial_changes WHERE user_id = 54321;
SELECT AVG(user_id) AS avg_user_id FROM financial_changes;
SELECT f.user_id, a.action_taken FROM financial_changes f LEFT JOIN audit_logs a ON f.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT * FROM audit_log LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, data FROM audit_log WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY last_updated ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT audit_id, audit_timestamp, user_id FROM audit_trail ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT id, timestamp, action FROM audit_log WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT table_name, action, user_id FROM audit_trail WHERE action = 'create' ORDER BY audit_timestamp;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE action LIKE '%delete%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin'
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'user'
SELECT timestamp, user_id, action FROM financial_data_changes ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT record_id, record_type, details FROM compliance_records LIMIT 3
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM users ORDER BY full_name
SELECT * FROM financial_data_changes WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT username, full_name, email FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, event_type FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, record_type, details FROM compliance_records WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, action_performed FROM audit_logs WHERE event_type = 'Login' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount < 500 AND description LIKE '%refund%';
SELECT * FROM transaction_audit_log WHERE user_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, description FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_audit_log WHERE action = 'approved' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles WHERE role IN ('admin', 'manager');
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, status FROM compliance_checks WHERE status = 'failed' ORDER BY transaction_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
